title: Simple Ways to Get God Human in Blox Fruits

steps.title: Get 400 mastery in the 5 second-stage fighting styles.
steps.content: Get 400 mastery in the 5 second-stage fighting styles. To get God Human in Blox Fruits, you'll need 400 mastery in Dragon Talon , Superhuman , Death Step , Electic Claw , and Sharkman Karate . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Gather your materials.
steps.content: Gather your materials. You'll need the following materials: 20 Fish Tails, 20 Magma Ore, 10 Dragon Scales, and 10 Mystic Droplets, as well as $5,000,000 and 5,000 fragments. To gather these mats easily, try using an auto-clicker . This will allow you to optimize your farming without wearing out your clicking muscles and save the buttons on your mouse. You can even go AFK with an auto clicker! Get the fish tails by defeating Fishman Commandos, Fishman Warriors, and Fishman Lords. Get the magma ore by defeating Military NPCs, like Soldiers, Spies, and Magma Admirals. To get the dragon scales, you must beat Dragon Crew Archers or Warriors. Get water droplets by defeating Water Fighters and Sea Soldiers. Alternatively, join Pirate Raids.

steps.title: Go to the Ancient Monk on Turtle Island.
steps.content: Go to the Ancient Monk on Turtle Island. He's inside a tree behind the Musketeer Pirates on the Floating Turtle. Talk to the Monk to buy the Godhuman fighting style. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Soaring Beast (Z).
steps.content: Soaring Beast ( Z ). 125 mastery. This is a dash skill that launches the player towards the cursor. If an enemy is caught in the dash, the player stops and punches in all directions, damaging anyone nearby. The last punch also knocks back other players. [3] X Research source You'll get higher damage against enemies that are in close range.

steps.title: Heaven and Earth (X).
steps.content: Heaven and Earth ( X ). 250 mastery. You can tap or hold the X key for different moves: [4] X Research source Tapped: Release a swift gust of wind that launches enemies upwards and deals damage. Held: Creates a whirlwind around the player that expands in size. After holding X for 4 seconds, the player claps their hands, which sends a powerful shockwave into the air. The longer you hold down X , the more powerful the shockwave is. If cast on the ground, the shockwave leaves behind a trail of debris. Unlike Superhuman, this attack hits enemies above and below the player.

steps.title: Sixth Realm Gun (C).
steps.content: Sixth Realm Gun ( C ). 350 mastery. You can tap or hold the C key for different moves: [5] X Research source Tapped: The player dashes towards the cursor and punches anything in the way. Anyone hit with the punch gets knocked back. The punch also deals extra damage to anyone within the blast radius. Held: The player dashes towards the cursor faster than if the button were tapped. If an enemy is caught in the dash, the player grabs them and charges up a punch. Although both the tapped and held versions look similar, this version deals much more damage and has a more powerful knock-back. [6] X Research source
